QuestData.Title: Ride to Heartwood Grove
QuestData.Description:
A storm of strife and fear rains down upon Heartwood Grove. Sylvar flee from the flood.
Brave the torrent astride a stag. Becalm the deluge and be the salvation of those who would drown.
Make haste. Time wanes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride a stag to Heartwood Grove.
QuestData.RewardText: We can't leave Heartwood Grove like this.
